title: Majees SC
text:
Majees Sports Club () is an <a href="Football%20clubs%20of%20Oman">Omani sports club</a> based in <a href="Majees">Majees</a>. The club is currently playing in the <a href="First%20Division%20League">First Division League</a> of <a href="Oman%20Football%20Association">Oman Football Association</a>. Their home ground is <a href="Sohar%20Regional%20Sports%20Complex">Sohar Regional Sports Complex</a>. The stadium is government owned, but they also own their own personal stadium and sports equipments, as well as their own training facilities.
History.
The club won the First Division league of <a href="Oman%20Football%20Association">Oman Football Association</a> in 2004. Majees SC then played in the <a href="2005%E2%80%9306%20Omani%20League">2005–06</a> season and in the <a href="2006%E2%80%9307%20Omani%20League">2006–07</a> season in the <a href="Omani%20League">Omani League</a>. In the 2006–07 season, they got relegated to the Second Division. The club got promoted to the <a href="Oman%20Professional%20League">Oman Professional League</a> again after they became the runners-up of the <a href="2012-13%20First%20Division%20League">2012-13 First Division League</a>.
Being a multisport club.
Although being mainly known for their football, Majees SC like many other clubs in Oman, have not only football in their list, but also <a href="field%20hockey">hockey</a>, <a href="volleyball">volleyball</a>, <a href="Team%20handball">handball</a>, <a href="basketball">basketball</a>, <a href="badminton">badminton</a> and <a href="squash%20%28sport%29">squash</a>. They also have a youth football team competing in the Omani Youth league.
Colors, kit providers and sponsors.
Majees SC have been known since establishment to wear a full <a href="blue">blue</a> or <a href="white">white</a> (Away) <a href="Kit%20%28association%20football%29">kit</a> (usually a lighter shade of blue). They have also had many different sponsors over the years. As of now, <a href="Adidas">Adidas</a> provides them with kits.
